MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-APR-2021 22:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Balerno. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:59am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate and repair an underground cable fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:00pm on Thursday, 08 April 2021
